    DatabaseConfig
    Database configuration utility class.
    DisplayExpRev
    Utility class responsible for displaying expenditure and revenue records.
    DisplayMinistries
    Utility class responsible for displaying financial expenditure data structured by governmental ministries.
    EditProcessor
    Processor class responsible for managing and editing financial application data.
    Education
    Represents financial data related to the education sector.
    EducationRepository
    Repository class responsible for data access operations related to Education entities.
    Environment
    Represents financial data related to the environmental sector.
    EnvironmentRepository
    Repository class responsible for data access operations related to Environment entities.
    Expenditure
    Represents a financial expenditure record.
    ExpenditureDetailed
    Represents a detailed financial expenditure record.
    ExpenditureDetailedRepository
    Repository class responsible for data access operations related to ExpenditureDetailed entities.
    ExpenditureMenu
    Provides a console-based menu for managing expenditure data.
    ExpenditureRepository
    Repository class responsible for data access operations related to Expenditure entities.
    ExpensesMenu
    Provides a console-based menu for managing expense records.
    FinanceMinistry
    Represents a financial record associated with a ministry entry.
    FinanceMinistryRepository
    Repository class responsible for data access operations related to FinanceMinistry entities.
    FinancialService
    Service layer providing high-level operations for financial data management.
    Health
    Represents a financial data entity associated with the health sector.
    HealthRepository
    Repository class responsible for data access operations related to Health entities.
    Main
    Main application class of the system.
    MinistryOfEducationMenu
    Provides a console-based menu for managing data related to the Ministry of Education, Religious Affairs and Sports.
    MinistryOfEnvironmentMenu
    Provides a console-based menu for managing data related to the Ministry of the Environment.
    MinistryOfFinanceMenu
    Provides a console-based menu for managing data related to the Ministry of Education, Religious Affairs and Sports.
    MinistryOfHealthMenu
    Provides a console-based menu for managing data related to the Ministry of Health.
    NationalDefense
    Represents a financial data entity related to national defense.
    NationalDefenseMenu
    Provides a console-based menu for managing data related to National Defense.
    NationalDefenseRepository
    Repository class responsible for data access operations related to NationalDefense entities.

    Revenue
    Represents a financial revenue record.
    RevenueMenu
    Provides a console-based menu for managing revenue data.
    RevenueRepository
    Repository class responsible for data access operations related to Revenue entities.
    YearsComparison
    Represents a financial comparison for a specific fiscal year.
    YearsComparisonMenu
    Provides methods to compare budget data across different years.
    YearsComparisonRepository
    Repository class responsible for retrieving YearsComparison data from the database.
